metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Similar to Bluey in its focus on social-emotional learning and gentle storytelling, with songs and relatable situations for young children.

metas.name: Octonauts
metas.description: Like Curious George, it combines adventure and education, focusing on marine biology and teamwork.

metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Offers educational adventures with animals, similar to the curiosity-driven exploration in Curious George, but with a focus on zoology.

metas.name: Doc McStuffins
metas.description: A gentle and educational show about a young girl who can talk to her toys and 'heals' them, promoting problem-solving and empathy.

metas.name: Peg + Cat
metas.description: An animated show that teaches basic math concepts through problem-solving and silly adventures, appealing to a similar age group as Bluey.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: Visually unique stop-motion animation that encourages exploration, creativity, and scientific discovery, reminiscent of the inquisitive spirit of Curious George.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: A beautifully animated Irish series about two puffin siblings exploring their island home, focusing on nature, friendship, and family, with a gentle tone like Bluey.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A whimsical and charming British animation that encourages imaginative play and observation, with a quiet, gentle humor similar to Bluey.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: An educational show that follows a young Alaskan Native girl as she learns about her culture and the world around her, blending adventure and learning.

metas.name: Alma's Way
metas.description: Focuses on a young Bronx girl of Puerto Rican descent who learns about her culture and community through problem-solving and family values.

metas.name: Rhyme Time Town
metas.description: An animated musical series that introduces children to basic literacy and problem-solving through fun rhymes and songs.

metas.name: If You Give a Mouse a Cookie
metas.description: Based on the popular book series, this show follows a chain of whimsical events and adventures, promoting creativity and cause-and-effect.

metas.name: Trash Truck
metas.description: A sweet and gentle animated series about a boy and his friendship with a talking trash truck, focusing on kindness and imagination.

metas.name: The Magic School Bus Rides Again
metas.description: A revival of the classic educational series, taking kids on exciting science adventures with Ms. Frizzle and her class.

metas.name: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum
metas.description: An educational series that teaches children about historical figures and events through time-traveling adventures.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: A vibrant and funny animated show that answers kids' burning questions about the world in a clear and engaging way.

metas.name: Go Jetters
metas.description: An educational adventure series where a team of young explorers travel the world learning about geography and landmarks.

metas.name: Arthur
metas.description: A long-running and beloved animated sitcom that explores relatable childhood issues, friendships, and family dynamics.

metas.name: Cyberchase
metas.description: An engaging animated series that teaches math and problem-solving skills through exciting cyber adventures.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: Focuses on preschool-aged children's natural curiosity about science and how the world works.

metas.name: Dragon Tales
metas.description: A classic animated series that teaches children about friendship, problem-solving, and emotional understanding through magical adventures.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: Uses the iconic Dr. Seuss character to explore various scientific topics in a fun and accessible way for young children.

metas.name: Super Wings
metas.description: An animated show about a boy and his airplane friends who deliver packages around the world and solve problems, incorporating geography and cultural awareness.

metas.name: Hey Duggee
metas.description: A delightful animated series where a group of animal children earn badges by completing fun activities and learning new things, with gentle humor and positive messages.

metas.name: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
metas.description: A humorous animated sitcom that, despite its premise, offers lighthearted family dynamics and silly adventures suitable for children.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A charming animated series about the beloved bear and his adventures in London, focusing on kindness, manners, and family.

metas.name: WordWorld
metas.description: An animated series that teaches early literacy by showing how letters form words and words create objects, with a focus on problem-solving.

metas.name: Lily's Driftwood Bay
metas.description: A gentle stop-motion animated series about a young girl and her animal friends on a beach, encouraging imagination and problem-solving.

metas.name: Tayo the Little Bus
metas.description: A gentle animated series about friendly buses and their adventures in the city, teaching about teamwork and the importance of different roles.

metas.name: Wallykazam!
metas.description: An educational animated series that uses magic and humor to teach preschoolers about letters and words.

metas.name: Pip and Posy
metas.description: A sweet animated show about the friendship between a mouse and a rabbit, exploring everyday adventures and emotional development, similar to Bluey's focus on peer relationships.

metas.name: The Wiggles World
metas.description: A live-action educational show featuring the popular music group, with songs, dances, and simple learning concepts.

metas.name: Zootopia+
metas.description: A series of shorts set in the world of Zootopia, offering lighthearted humor and exploration of different characters' lives, suitable for family viewing.
